wobani.toolbox

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.toolbox.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class for loading images from file using the STBI library.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(@NotNull
             java.io.File path,
             boolean flip)
        Initializes a new Image by loading the specified image from file using the STBI library.
        Parameters:
        path - image's relative path (with extension like "res/textures/myTexture.png")
        flip - true if you want to flip the image upside down, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        private void loadImage(@NotNull
                       java.io.File path,
                       boolean flip)
        Loads the specified image from file.
        Parameters:
        path - the image's path
        flip - true if you want to flip the image upside down, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NativeException - stbi can't load the image
